message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its high value and quality, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposed price for the product is $9,500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $9,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm happy to meet in the middle at $9,250.  Let me know what you think.

I see you're trying to find a fair price, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $9,375 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our positions and allows us to reach an agreement.
